description: In one apartment complex, three very different spaces made out of the same basic B-Line kitchen.
title: The Neighbor’s Renovation
title_page: The Neighbor’s Renovation - The New York Times
text: A trio of neighbors living in the same apartment complex in Clinton Hill, Brooklyn, created three very different spaces out of the same basic B-Line kitchen. Sarah Lantz and Becky Froman used floating walnut shelves and bright white counters to create an open, airy feel.
